tag_professor: Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She is a great professor, Very helpful and is always there to answer questions. Spend time with students who needed help. She encourages group study. Very fair. Bottom line you have to do your part as a student..Study!!!I took her class last spring and it wasn\'t easy to stay awake after an overnight shift and I still got an A:)

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Great instructor! I am currently taking her intro to chem. Things do go pretty quick but she has a curriculum to follow. She is always willing to explain and is available when needed. The material is not easy. Studying is MANDATORY. Workload is decent.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: The content she teaches is HARD. The comments are true what they say about her. I am currently struggling in her class at failing mark, she teaches way to fast and is note reliant. I\'m currently taking intro to Chem and this is REALLY in depth compared to other classes. She hates cell phones and treats us like children. Just avoid her class.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: this is teacher is very hard! she is not helpful at all, goes way to fast, and does not care if you understand the material or not. she gives you her tutoring hours but when you go to meet with her she\'s never there. when she does study groups for her class its always at an inconvenient time. avoid this teacher at all costs!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: An extremely easy class if you pay attention. She does go through some of the work fast, but it is easy to print her powerpoints out prior to class. She is always willing to help, give examples, and answer questions. She is really nice, too. I am a full time student and found her workload to be reasonable. Just pay attention in class and read.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I\'m taking Professor Adrian right now and she is such a good teacher! Yes she may go fast but she explains everything so well, there has not been one concept i haven\'t understood yet! She always takes the time to help you if you need it and her tutoring door is always open! I will suggest her to anyone!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Difficult, she tries too hard to be nice. It comes off as completely fake. Her tests were over enormous amounts of material and were incredibly difficult. She explains things fairly well, bur still, avoid her if you can. Avoid, avoid, avoid.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This is a hard class and you have to pay attention, but this teacher is really good if you know how to listen. Make sure you print the powerpoint slides before class and make sure your paying attention!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Nice Teacher, but goes to fast when it comes to the problem solving sections. Write down everything she says and study all the slides if you want to pass.Do good in her class early on if you want to pass the class.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Mrs. Adrian is very nice, but teaches in a way that is very difficult to undersstand. Goes thru the material way too fast and continues even if you don\'t understand. Attendance is mandatory in her class and cell phones are a huge NO, NO in her class.
